title: How bad would Lee Sin be if he lost ward hopping and what would he need for compensation?
body: A lot of people want his ward hopping gone, and with Katarina losing the ability it seems like a possibility for Lee. But just how much would this screw Lee over and could it be replaced with something else?

He loses his versatility and the ability to do what few champs can't though: Hopping over walls. I think ward hops are just too crucial to his kit to be removed. If you remove ward hoping, then it becomes increasingly hard for him to actually get into the back line or make the plays that he was famous for. If you don't end the game within a certain amount of time, he'll just become even more useless late.
Good. I'm tired of his InSec bullshit. He wants to get to backline? Make him flank through normal points like everyone else.
...you do realize how many junglers and assassins have blinks/dashes/invisibility/wallhops that are just as if not more so capable of getting into the backline and 100-0 the squishies?
...you do realize that Lee Sin has more versatility than pretty much all of them?

Not totally true. Ekko has a dash/wall hop that is also a blink-to-enemy empowered auto, a slow zone/timed stun, a healing/do-over ult, a ranged slow that applies on hit effect. That's a bit of versatility if you ask me.

I feel like it's relevant to point out that removing the ward hop would lower his skill ceiling because of the lower mechanical execution required to play him at maximum effectiveness.

Only thing that would replace that is probably a monk type pocket flash or a really good gap closer(besides q.. If u miss q u cant do shit, hence why need another closer.)

That's why people hate Lee. 

With other champs, if you miss your skillshot, you can't do shit. You don't have 6 ways to get onto someone. We're only asking that he operate like other champs, in that he needs to hit his skillshots to do things.

Only {{champion:64}} and {{champion:24}} still have this nonsensical interaction with wards. 

I'm not saying he's OP as is, but I DO think it's bad for the game. He can get compensated any way they want, including some kind of blink. I really don't care. But I HATE that only 2 champs in the game have special dashes with wards. It's just silly to balance for. Take it out.

It really doesn't make sense if you thing about it. The biggest weakness of targeted dashes is that you need a target. In exchange they get reliability, typically more range, and overall more dmg. When you can simple "create" a target by placing a {{item:3649}} it completely undermines it's counterplay vs skillshot dashes. Also, let us not forget that EVERYONE has a skillshot dash {{summoner:4}}
